name: FarWatch
description:
After many reports about torture, murder and illegal experiments, Karlheinz asylum was closed for good.

4 years later,  you are forcefully sent to recover confidential documents that were forgotten by time. 

Abandoned or not, you are not alone.

Don't die

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Move around

Shift - Sprint

Left Click - Interact / Pick Up

Right Click - Use high voltage tazer

This game is still in Beta. Any feedback is appreciated
